Sentencas: A novel concept that employs dual chamber SOFC technology with a porous electrolyte, which allows the controlled distribution of gaseous O-2 at the anode side, was successfully designed using an all porous structure.
Titulo: An all porous solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC): a bridging technology between dual and single chamber SOFCs

Sentencas: The oxidative reforming of hydrocarbon streams can consequently operate in a similar fashion to single chamber SOFCs, but within a safer, better controlled process.
Titulo: An all porous solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC): a bridging technology between dual and single chamber SOFCs
